measure.CatchLine: Creates property tax exemption for owner occupied principal dwelling of certain seniors.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Creates property tax exemption for owner occupied principal dwelling of certain seniors. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to a property tax exemption for the homesteads of certain seniors; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to a property tax exemption for the homesteads of certain seniors; prescribing an effective date.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of Senate Interim Committee on Finance and Revenue)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Housing and Development, then Tax Expenditures.
